school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ
comments: You may want to avoid taking his online class. TONS of reading, NUMEROUS discussion posts you must respond to. You\'re pretty much on your own in terms of learning the material - and then you get hit with a final that is ALL ESSAYS (14 of them) - both short and long. And he\'s particular about how you write your sentences.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Mind-numbing. One good thing was the paper. Throws tons of reading and questions at you, but no real teaching. You teach yourself. Posts had to be 3 or 7 sentences. Multiple 4-paragraph essays on a cumulative final. No other tests, but there should have been over having 1 final. Can only post on certain days, lessening the value of an online class.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Hes a pain in the ass. A good professor, but a serious pain. The responses due for each class are pretty interesting and easy but what he wants for the papers is soooooo annoying. Is helpful, but only on his time line. Hes alright...

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: I really didn\'t like this class. He\'s ok.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: He is an ok teacher, but his course has a lot of work. The textbook is required and there are other required readings posted online. After every reading there is a reading response to do before the next class. There is also 2 term papers. No midterm, BUT the final is very, VERY writing intensive, but he grades it easy. Also participate in class.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: Great professor, reading is a must, but it is fun because he goes over it and the final is based on some words. Easy Class. Easy A. All you have to do is read short chapter, participate, For the guy who said you read a lot,haha you noob, this class was great.If you think you would get an A just by coming to class and sleeping don\'t waste his time.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: Professor Hafer is one of the best history professors in John Jay. Lessons were very well organized and stuck to the textbook and the syllabus. The course was a lot of work but if you put in the effort you got a good grade. I recommend taking him you will learn a lot!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: Requires to read each class but at end of textbook is a review which helped me do the assignments. Make sure to participate! 2 papers he makes you do but very easy. Final will seem hard but he grades it pretty fairly and easy. Just keep up with work and not be lazy. Cool dude.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: WELL FIRST OF ALL TOO MUCH READING. EVERY CLASS THERE IS A READING RESPONSE AND THAT RESPONSE NOT EVEN ONE OR TWO PAGES. ITS A WHOLE CHAPTER SOMETIMES. I HATED HIS CLASS. TOO MUCH PRESSURE. AND HE ALSO A VERY HARD GRADER. I RECOMMEND THOSE STUDENT TO HIM WHO REALLY LIKE TO READ ALL DAY LONG. HE GIVE UNDERSTANDABLE LECTURE BUT TOO MANY READINGS.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: There is a reading response due every class day. Two reasearch papers. A midterm and a final. Easy class. Just read and take notes and you\'ll do fine.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: You will learn a lot from his class. Reading & writing intensive, but worth the knowledge u receive in return. His 2 papers were annoying in what he wanted. Midterm and Final were easy. Must write reading responses for every class (basically a paper). He\'s an overall great professor. Book he chose is great and is referenced in many other books.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: Amazing professor, completely amazing. Clear, concise, helpful, open minded. He does not tell you what to think, but allows you to think on your own. History was no longer as boring as before for me. I would take him again. I seriously recommend him. one paper, quizzes every week you MUST read for, and one final. Loved him !

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: Very transparent in all that he does so you will definitely know what grade to expect at the end of the semester. Seriously, I believe he should be nominated for a teaching award. He is absolutely phenomenal at teaching. I disliked history before this class but he somehow made it interesting and did not pretend to know everything. NOMINATE HIM!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: Highly recommended. Work is easy, but you will take knowledge away after taking the class. Reading intensive, and somewhat writing intensive, however you can free write on papers. As long as you show the necessary respect, you will have a great semester.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: He is extremely helpful with any question that his students have. Work-wise (keep in mind this was a 300 level class), students had to write reading responses for every class, two papers, plus a final exam. Not hard at all. I highly recommend him.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: amazing amazing amazing. vey relaxed clear sweet and willing to help and explain and then he\'ll help and explain. HIGHLYYYYY recommended.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: He\'s a pretty good professor. His paper isn\'t hard at all and the way he structures it makes it easier to complete. You must read every chapter of that textbook though because if you don\'t, you will struggle on his quizzes & tests. Goodluck!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: The quizzes are a bit tricky but he drops 3 quiz grades so there\'s a bit of leeway. Don\'t be late u will miss the quiz. No midterm, 5 page research paper which he is very helpful with any questions regarding it & grades easily & a final. he takes a while to answer emails but he does answer them. Take him!

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: This professor is good. You get quizzes every week but they are straightforward. There is one research paper, but he grades it easily. No midterm, just one final. Gives decent lectures and is very helpful. Doesn\'t always answer e-mails on time though. And not cute, don\'t get your hopes up. Whoever said he was a cutie is blind. Still, very nice guy.

school_name: John Jay College of Criminal Justice
tag_professor: Get ready to read (5)  Participation matters (3)  Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)
comments: He is amazing. he gives a weekly quiz but its really easy if you study the words. theres one 5pg research paper and a final. no midterm. he drops 3 lowest quiz grades. hes rly helpful & always makes sure that everyone understands the material before moving on. take him!!
